resources.string: For learning purposes only, use at your own risk!

"1. This software is designed for learning Android development and does not collect any user data. " "It is strictly prohibited to use this software to infringe on others' privacy or for profit in games. If users cannot comply with this regulation, please delete it immediately. " "Users are solely responsible for any adverse consequences caused by using this software, including privacy leakage of themselves or others. The software author assumes no responsibility.
" "2. Users may not reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble this software product. Violations constitute infringement and users shall bear any adverse consequences arising therefrom.
" "3. The software guarantees that it does not contain any viruses, trojans, or other malicious code that damages user data. However, since this software can be downloaded and distributed through the network, the software author cannot guarantee that software downloaded from non-official sites is free from computer viruses, hidden trojan programs, or hacker software, and assumes no direct or indirect liability for damages arising therefrom.
" "4. The software will be continuously updated to provide users with new features and fix bugs. The software author also guarantees that the software does not contain any malicious code designed to damage user computer data during upgrades.
" "5. Due to the diversity and complexity of user computer hardware and software environments, the functions provided by this software cannot be guaranteed to execute normally or achieve the expected results in all circumstances. The software author assumes no responsibility for any consequences arising from user use of this software.
" "6. If users install this software themselves, it indicates that they trust the software author, voluntarily choose to install this software, and accept all terms of this agreement. If users do not accept this agreement, please delete it immediately.
"
